name: MYC_MESG_CHILD
description: The MYC_MESG_CHILD table contains information about the child message of Secure Patient Message records. Child messages are replies to a Secure Patient Message.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHILD_MSG_ID
columns.description: The child messages for the web based chart system message record. Child messages are replies to the current message.
